titles: A form for Church government and ordination of ministers, contained in CXI propositions, propounded to the late Generall Assembly at Edinburgh, 1647. Together with an Act concerning Erastianisme, independencie, and liberty of conscience. Published by authority.
CXI propositions concerning the ministerie and government of the Church.
author: Gillespie, George, 1613-1648.
publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, at the King's Head in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Originally published in Edinburgh as: CXI propositions concerning the ministerie and government of the Church.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Church of Scotland --  Government --  Early works to 1800.
Church of Scotland --  Clergy --  Early works to 1800.
Ordination --  Church of Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
Liberty of conscience --  Early works to 1800.
